name: Nichibutsu Arcade Classics
overview: Nichibutsu Arcade Classics is a compilation for the Super Famicom released in 1995. It features three of Nichibutsu's (or Nihon Bussan) Arcade games from the early 80s, adapted for consoles but otherwise left as-is. Contract developers Syscom were brought in to make the adaptations. It was followed up by Nichibutsu Arcade Classics 2, which contained the original 1979 Arcade version of Heiankyo Alien and a graphically enhanced remake. Games Included: Crazy Climber: An action game where the protagonist scales a building. Best known for its complex controls that independently control each hand. Frisky Tom: An action game where the protagonist has to maintain a plumbing system and protect it from rogue rats. Moon Cresta: A single-screen shoot 'em up similar to Galaxian in which the player's ship can dock with larger ships between stages to become more powerful.
